thread.section_title: SaratogaWine.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SaratogaWine.com | www.saratogawine.com
thread.title: Big Al "The Wine Guy"
thread.title_full: SaratogaWine.com reviewed by Big Al "The Wine Guy"

author: Big Al "The Wine Guy"
title: Big Al "The Wine Guy"
text: SaratogaWine.com is BY FAR the most convenient and accommodating wine/liquor website I have used for my wine and liquor purchases. Their pricing is EXTREMELY competitive, their customer service is EXCELLENT and I very much like their FREE SHIPPING option when my purchase achieves a certain dollar amount.
